meanings.definition: A person who has made a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: Tommy is such a fuckup when it comes to following instructions.
meanings.sent2: She always feels like a fuckup after forgetting important dates.
meanings.sent3: The party planner turned into a fuckup when the cake was dropped.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as a fuckup spread like wildfire in the office.
meanings.sent5: Being labeled as a fuckup can be demoralizing and discouraging.

meanings.definition: To make a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: I tend to fuckup simple tasks when I'm feeling overwhelmed.
meanings.sent2: Don't worry if you fuckup, mistakes happen to everyone.
meanings.sent3: He managed to fuckup the recipe by adding salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt to fix the computer only seemed to fuckup things more.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's joke timing seemed to fuckup the punchline every time.

meanings.definition: A situation or event that has gone wrong.
meanings.sent1: The project turned into a fuckup due to miscommunication.
meanings.sent2: The party was a total fuckup with the wrong decorations.
meanings.sent3: The camping trip became a fuckup when it started raining non-stop.
meanings.sent4: The concert turned into a fuckup when the main singer got sick.
meanings.sent5: The vacation was a complete fuckup from start to finish.
